Comments_List: How to think about Solid State Physics in a practical way for research purposes
I thought it was a well taught course. As someone who only audited, I can't speak to much as I wasn't as involved as a regularly enrolled student

more regular problem sets
more structure on project -- maybe require a proposal or draft
Absolutely, the instructor knows Solid State very well and teaches students how to think about the subject in a way that is helpful academically and in research.
